definition: abbr. for the Big Dipper constellation 北斗星[Bei3 dou3 xing1]
to fight/to struggle/to condemn/to censure/to contend/to put together/coming together
dry measure for grain equal to ten 升[sheng1] or one-tenth of a 石[dan4]/decaliter/peck/cup or dipper shaped object/old variant of 陡[dou3]

sentences.english: Isn't that fun? I enjoy lying on the field at night and looking up at the starry sky.
sentences.chinese: 马可大哥喜欢夜晚时分躺在营地上，看著满天星斗。

sentences.english: I also love looking at the stars on a clear night.
sentences.chinese: 马可大哥喜欢夜晚时分躺在营地上，看著满天星斗。

sentences.english: The night sky is now gorgeous with billions of stars.
sentences.chinese: 我是在一个满天星斗的冬夜遇到他的。

sentences.english: Kong Jue, one flashing red star.
sentences.chinese: 孔厥，一闪而过的红色星斗。

sentences.english: Looking up at the stars of sky.
She saw the black sky full of stars.
sentences.chinese: 她看到满天星斗的夜空。

sentences.english: We have imported lamps in the garden; they have the stars.
sentences.chinese: 我们在花园里装了进口灯具，而他们有满天星斗。

sentences.english: At night, it is fine, a star-studded sky.
sentences.chinese: 夜里，天气晴朗，满天星斗。

sentences.english: I like the starry winter sky.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢这满天星斗的冬夜。

sentences.english: The gift, the snowflake, the starry sky, the moonlight all give you.
sentences.chinese: 礼物，雪花，满天星斗的天空，在月光下的所有给你。

sentences.english: I met him on a starry winter evening.
sentences.chinese: 满天星斗的冬夜遇到他的。

definition: constellation (arch., now 星座)/one of the 28 constellations of traditional Chinese astronomy and astrology/motion of stars since one's birth (predetermining one's fate in astrology)
Qixing district of Guilin city 桂林市[Gui4 lin2 shi4], Guangxi
many stars/a vast sky full of stars
Mercury in traditional Chinese astronomy/see also 水星[shui3 xing1]
the seven planets of premodern astronomy (the Sun, the Moon, Mercury, Venus, Mars, Jupiter, and Saturn)
Golden Crow/the sun/the three-legged golden crow that lives in the sun
meteorological or astronomical phenomenon (e.g. rainbow or eclipse)
great emptiness/the void/heaven/the skies/universe/cosmos/original essence of the cosmos
